properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a vendor

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a vendor

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a vendor

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a vendor

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many vendors

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a vendor

properties.name: vendorName
properties.description: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: vendorId
properties.description: ID of the vendor to delete

properties.name: vendorId
properties.description: ID of the vendor to retrieve

properties.name: vendorId
properties.description: ID of the vendor to update

properties.name: accountName
properties.description: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Name of the account’s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

options.name: Account_Site
options.description: Name of the account’s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

options.name: Account_Type
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: Employees
options.description: Number of employees in the account’s company

options.name: Exchange_Rate
options.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to delete. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to retrieve. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of the account to update. Can be found at the end of the URL.

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Name of the account’s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

options.description: Name of the account’s location, e.g. Headquarters or London

options.name: Account_Type
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: Employees
options.description: Number of employees in the account’s company

options.name: Exchange_Rate
options.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

properties.name: dealName
properties.description: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.description: Monetary amount of the deal

options.name: Amount
options.description: Monetary amount of the deal

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: Lead_Conversion_Time
options.description: Average number of days to convert the lead into a deal

options.name: Next_Step
options.description: Description of the next step in the sales process

options.name: Overall_Sales_Duration
options.description: Average number of days to convert the lead into a deal and to win the deal

options.name: Probability
options.description: Probability of deal closure as a percentage. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

options.name: Sales_Cycle_Duration
options.description: Average number of days for the deal to be won

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Subject or title of the invoice. If a record with this subject exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: ID of the account associated with this invoice. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: accountId
options.description: ID of the account associated with this invoice. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Adjustment
options.description: Adjustment in the grand total, if any

options.name: Currency
options.description: Symbol of the currency in which revenue is generated

options.name: Exchange_Rate
options.description: Exchange rate of the default currency to the home currency

options.name: Grand_Total
options.description: Total amount for the product after deducting tax and discounts

options.name: Sales_Commission
options.description: Commission of sales person on deal closure as a percentage. For example, enter 12 for 12%.

options.name: Sub_Total
options.description: Total amount for the product excluding tax

options.name: Tax
options.description: Tax amount as the sum of sales tax and value-added tax

options.name: Terms_and_Conditions
options.description: Terms and conditions associated with the invoice

subProperties.description: Tax amount as the sum of sales tax and value-added tax

subProperties.name: Terms_and_Conditions
subProperties.description: Terms and conditions associated with the purchase order

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
